entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:53 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 08:53 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
